name: Penguin Run 3D
description:
Run against fast penguins in 3D running world. Collect as many fish as possible and reach the finish first to eat your loot, so you would gain maximum momentum for scoring your record. Good luck!

Native webgl, friendly for mobile (ios/android) and for windows.

Device screen adaptable. 

WAD or Arrow keys to move, slide on ice and run snowy uphill.
